reviews.review: Muito bom, porem ultimamente esta tendo bastante hack, mas acho que é por conta das promoções do final do ano passado, acaba tendo bastante gente com compra o jogo só pra fazer esse tipo de coisa

The replayability of this game even after being off on other games for a year is my favorite thing. I still have fun in Dust ][ Casual with all the lunatics late nights. And it just feels like coming home after the dissapoinment of Overwatch, this game is a classic that just feels like riding a bike. Thank God for CS:GO!

OLD BUT VERY FUN!!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND. PRACTICE PRACTICE YOU WILL NOT BE GOD AT FIRST AT THE GAME LEARN UR SHOOTING TECHNIQUES AND YOU WILL LOVE THE GAME!!! GRAPHICS ARE DECENT CAN PLAY ON OLDER SYSTEMS AS WELL.
Russians, Cheaters, Smurf, Updates that change your skill.....this game is dead

The ranking system is kinda broke and tends to hard stick people into lower ranks, but I can't stress enough, this game is super rewarding to get good at.

Game is better with friends so try to make some quick, as randoms aren't reliable really. 

Don't pick up for casual aspects imo, there are other games that do that better.
